name: OR_IMP_EXPLANT
description: The OR_IMP_EXPLANT table contains OR management system explant information for implants.

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the implant record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the explant information for the implant.

columns.name: EXPLANTED_DATE
columns.description: The date the implant was explanted.

columns.name: EXPLANT_LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the log in which the implant was explanted.

columns.name: EXPL_MANF_NOTF_DT
columns.description: The date the manufacturer was notified that the implant was explanted.

columns.name: EXPLANTED_TIME
columns.description: The time when implant was explanted.

columns.name: EXPLANT_STAFF_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the physician/staff who explanted the listed implant.

columns.name: NUM_EXPLANTED
columns.description: The number of items that were explanted.
